import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import * as Aos from 'aos'; import { FormPortService } from '../form-port.service'; import { Formulaire } from '../models/formulaire'; @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', templateUrl: './projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./projects.component.css'] }) export class ProjectsComponent { @Input() personne: Formulaire[] = []; constructor( private formPort:FormPortService, ){} ngOnInit() { Aos.init(); } }
